title: Textile, "Finnish Hop", 1946
medium:
Medium: Aralac
Technique: screen printed on twill woven foundation
inscribed: Finnish Hop by V.L.D.(printed in right selvedge); A Folly Cove Design Exclusively for Schumacher (printed in left selvedge)
creditline: Museum Purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Length of printed fabric with curving vertical stripes alternating brown and off-white, each stripe punctuated with figures of couples dancing.
